resources.string:
I started programming when I was 11, and it's been my passion ever since. 
In highschool I developed an Access Database for the Juvenile Assessment Center with Galveston ISD. 
Once I graduated, I became a programmer and systems analyst for Prologic Technology. My main focus was writing SQL, Java, and Groovy scripts in the Student Data department. 

Many years later, I have returned to school to pursue my Bachelors in Computer Science. Recently I have worked on the following projects: 
Fall Semester: Encryption program using Vigenere and Caesar Cipher Web crawler 
Summer Semester: IOT device measuring and displaying object distance. 
Spring Semester: Library Study Room Reservation System
